name: Enemy
wishText: These memories we've made over the years mean everything to me,The jury and I will always be by your side, just like you've been there for me. We have shared and grown a lot and there is still a lot ahead! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! ðŸŽ‰ Yeee! I'm so grateful to have you in my life, and I hope we can continue making many more amazing memories together. Watching you grow and thrive is such an inspiration to me, and it always motivates me to push myself to be better, too. That's why I call you my 'enemy,' because you challenge me in the best possible way. But honestly, you're more like my partner in crime, always pushing me to be my best self. Here's to another year of friendship, growth, and unforgettable moments.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
